chunks.zh: 每个小时或者每间隔十几分钟就想起她，是喜欢吗？
chunks.en: Is it love if I think of her every hour or every ten minutes?

chunks.zh: 认识一位女生，每天没有需要特别投入的事情，就会想起她；
chunks.en: I know a girl, and I think of her every day when there's nothing special I need to focus on;

chunks.zh: 可是也不是那种会一直找她？
chunks.en: But it's not the kind of thing where I'm constantly looking for her?

chunks.zh: 回避型依恋人格？
chunks.en: Avoidant attachment style?

chunks.zh: 也没有好奇她在做什么，只是单纯地想到她；
chunks.en: I'm not curious about what she's doing, I just simply think of her;

chunks.zh: 如果每天都经常想到她，是喜欢她了吗？
chunks.en: If I think of her often every day, do I like her?

chunks.zh: 是发情了，好好赚钱，有钱了什么都有，不行就去洗个脚
chunks.en: You're just horny, focus on making money, you'll have everything when you're rich, if not, go get a foot massage.

chunks.zh: 春天来了，万物复苏，又到了动物们繁殖的季节，山林的空气中弥漫着荷尔蒙的气息！😆
chunks.en: Spring is here, all things recover, it's the season for animals to reproduce again, the air in the forest is filled with the scent of hormones! 😆

chunks.zh: 狠狠撸三次，如果还是这想法就是真喜欢
chunks.en: Masturbate hard three times, if you still have the same thought then it's true love.

chunks.zh: 有请楼下的放出朱元璋义父表情包
chunks.en: Requesting the person below to post the Zhu Yuanzhang godfather meme.

chunks.zh: 你说过牵了手就叫约定
chunks.en: You said that holding hands is called a promise.

chunks.zh: @M48A1 这不就很清楚了吗？她是你寄托喜欢的一个对象，你喜欢的是你的幻想。你都不了解别个，你只是将一些自己喜欢的特质和情绪寄托到了那个人的身上而已。不想打破幻想就别想了，让她成为梦中情人，别去找她又梦醒了
chunks.en: @M48A1 Isn't it clear? She's an object you project your affection onto, you're in love with your fantasy. You don't even understand her, you're just projecting qualities and emotions you like onto that person. If you don't want to break the illusion, then don't think about it, let her be a dream lover, don't go looking for her and then wake up from the dream.

chunks.zh: 大胆表白，失败就去嫖
chunks.en: Confess boldly, if you fail, go get a prostitute.

chunks.zh: 单纯春天来了而已,你圈子里漂亮女生多的话,你就不会每天只想一个(狗头)
chunks.en: It's just spring, if there were more pretty girls in your circle, you wouldn't just think about one every day (doge).

chunks.zh: @wegbjwjm 是发情的这个阶段，然后在之前认识这么多人之中只想一个。
chunks.en: @wegbjwjm It's this horny stage, and then among all the people I've met before, I only think about one.

chunks.zh: 发情而已，没接触过段时间就好了。
chunks.en: Just horny, it'll be fine after a while without contact.

chunks.zh: 恋爱的感觉
chunks.en: The feeling of being in love.

chunks.zh: 多认识女生
chunks.en: Get to know more girls.

chunks.zh: 是的，喜欢就去表白
chunks.en: Yes, if you like her, confess.

chunks.zh: @YGHMXFAL @daybreakfangyang @fanersai @jasonlwy @keengrass @reoah2 @slowmist 得到一个回复“别装别装，装逼被雷劈。”如果之前已经是喜欢的话，现在已经爱的死去活来了。
chunks.en: @YGHMXFAL @daybreakfangyang @fanersai @jasonlwy @keengrass @reoah2 @slowmist Got a reply: 'Stop pretending, stop pretending, showing off will get you struck by lightning.' If I already liked her before, now I'm head over heels in love.

chunks.zh: 聊聊，如果不反感就继续，如果反感就撤
chunks.en: Chat, if she doesn't mind, continue, if she minds, then back off.

chunks.zh: @kulous 就是前段时间聊多了点认识有段时间了如果只是我发情，那是要慎重考虑一下，不能影响到别人吧
chunks.en: @kulous I just chatted with her a bit more some time ago and have known her for a while. If it's just me being horny, then I need to think carefully, I can't affect others.

chunks.zh: @M48A1 那就吃饭看电影出去耍…如果她也不反感就表白，如果约不出来就放弃。
chunks.en: @M48A1 Then go out for dinner, movies, play... If she doesn't mind, confess, if you can't get her out, give up.

chunks.zh: 可能只是单纯馋别人身子了。
chunks.en: Maybe you're just simply lusting after her body.

chunks.zh: 以前读过一本书：> 真不好意思，我在隔离期间，还做了几次朦胧地流氓梦并且“放了水”。梦外我是反革命，梦里我是流氓。由于白天从事的是脑力劳动，是“文字”工作，觉就睡不太好了。失眠时想的更多的是厂里漂亮女工，今夜想这个，下夜想那个，每晚都挺专一的。
chunks.en: I read a book before: > I'm really sorry, during the quarantine, I also had some vague hooligan dreams and 'released the water.' Outside the dream I am a counter-revolutionary, in the dream I am a hooligan. Because I do mental labor during the day, 'writing' work, I can't sleep very well. When I'm sleepless, I think more about the beautiful female workers in the factory, I think about this one tonight, that one the next night, I'm quite consistent every night.
